Articles.Content:
Hey guys/gals,

I'm having an issue with my mun base atm. Everything was going well until i attached the latest part and the whole thing decided it was going to do a death roll. Has anyone ran into this and if so have any solutions?

Edited July 14, 2013 by jscheiben
Try quicksaving and quickloading, it sometimes solves it for me, but when i have a bad craft I usually undock it and trash it.
i have trashed the first one, made a new one and same issue.
hey sal_vager, thanks for the tip of quicksave/load upon docking, it seems to have worked.
